channel.title: Iñaki Fuentes
channel.description: COO at Travelgate. Leading operations and strategy for the world's largest travel marketplace. Thoughts on business, technology, and AI automation.

item.title: What I'm Doing Now - November 2025
item.dc:creator: Iñaki Fuentes
item.description:
Current focus as COO at Travelgate: scaling partnerships, building AI-driven automation, and optimizing operations across the world's largest travel marketplace.

Also exploring systems thinking, web performance optimization, and advising early-stage startups.

item.title: Professional Experience and Education
item.dc:creator: Iñaki Fuentes
item.description:
Career journey from systems administration to engineering management, CTO roles, and currently COO at Travelgate.

Education includes MSc in Computer Network Technology from Northumbria University and continuing education in operations management, finance, and leadership.
